title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Nakshi Haaram Set
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Natural Emeralds
Oval Cabochon Cut (VS Clarity); Brilliant Cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
features: This exquisite necklace features a contemporary Haaram design. Emerald gemstones, in a classic oval cabochon cut, are meticulously set within borders of sparkling, brilliant-cut diamonds. The Y-shaped pendant enhances the elegance, leading the eye to a cascade of Emeralds and diamonds. Matching drop earrings complete the set.
colors: Lustrous Yellow Gold; Deep Green Emeralds; Dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: and as a valuable heirloom piece. Perfect for Seemantham
description: This stunning necklace set combines the timeless elegance of emeralds and diamonds with impeccable Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The natural emeralds are carefully selected for their rich color and clarity, creating a striking contrast against the brilliance of the diamonds. This set is not just jewelry; it's an investment in artistry and tradition, designed to be cherished for generations.
